title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for building modern websites.

title: Advanced JavaScript
description: Master advanced JavaScript concepts including async programming, design patterns, and frameworks.
assessment: 3 coding challenges, 1 research paper, final project
sampleProject: Interactive web application with API integration

title: Network Security Essentials
description: Understand network vulnerabilities, security protocols, and defense mechanisms.
assessment: 2 case studies, 1 lab report, written exam

title: Database Design and Management
description: Learn to design relational databases, write SQL queries, and manage database systems.
assessment: 3 practical exercises, database design project, written exam

title: Mobile App Development
description: Develop cross-platform mobile applications using modern frameworks and tools.
sampleProject: Utility mobile application with backend integration
